name: Mixing Madness
description:
Description

A local 2-player versus  game based on the  80's thriller, The Shining. You each  play as a bartender from one of the movie's most famous scenes.  The aim is to mix ingredients to make drinks, serve them to Jack Torrance and sway his mental status; The blue bartender keeping him sane, whilst the red driving him insane.

Controls 

  • Left Joystick:  Navigate menus
  • 'A' Xbox controller: Select in menus / Pick up or place down items in game
  • 'B' Xbox controller: Cancel selection / Back out of menu
  • 'X'  Xbox controller: Use stations / Poison drinks in game
